searchTerms.title: Search terms
searchTerms.description: (Required if 'spreadsheetId' is not provided) List of search terms to be scraped.

spreadsheetId.title: Spreadsheet id
spreadsheetId.description:
(Optional) Id of the google sheet from where search terms will be loaded.
 Spreadsheet must have only one column. Row 1 is considered the title of the column so it will not be loaded as a search term. Check the actor documentation for more info.

isPublic.title: Is public
isPublic.description: If checked you can import a public spreadsheet without need for authorization. For importing private sheets, please read about authorization in the actor documentation.

timeRange.title: Time range
timeRange.description: Choose a predefined search's time range (defaults to 'Past 12 months')

category.title: Category
category.description: Choose a category to filter the search for (defaults to 'All categories')

maxItems.title: Max items
maxItems.description: Limit of product items to be scraped. Zero value means no limit.

customTimeRange.title: Custom time range
customTimeRange.description: Provide a custom time range. If provided, it takes precedence over regular timeRange. Read the documentation for correct format and examples.

extendOutputFunction.title: Extend output function
extendOutputFunction.description: A function which result will get merged with the default result. It must return an object.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: The best option is usually Automatic proxy, but you can also use your own proxies or no proxy. It defaults to useApifyProxy. Country defaults to 'US'.
